org.qcri.cymphony.simulator.api.entrypoint

Interface SimulatorAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api.Service

    public interface SimulatorAPI
extends com.lightbend.lagom.javadsl.api.Service
    SimulatorAPI is an example of an extension of Service, the main goal of this service is allow to create a pipeline of simulation, this will allow the creation of test with more robust concept and also create experiments for the papers the idea conceptualy is to have 4 step in the pipeline:
    1. Creation of the Worker: This step will be the responsibility to create a pool of worker with some characteristics, this will be independent to every test, because of the characteristic of the testing
    2. Creation of the Project: Will generate the pipeline, base in templates, or provided by the configuration file. The project will be the one that will use in the annotations
    3. Annotating: Is the step where many user will be annotating the task, but this annotation will 3 step.
      1. Get Hit: For every user will get a Hit from the Cymphony Backend
      2. Pick the annotation: Will pick or generate a simulated annotation, this annotation will be the answer of the worker that will be committed
      3. lala
    4. lolo
